intro: See the truth beyond the mosaic!
description:
Mosaic Quiz is a quick-reaction game where you look at a pixelated image  
and guess which of two options it is  

It’s just out of focus enough to drive you crazy  
find clues in the blur and uncover the answer  

Some questions are tricky, others hilarious  
You can play it as a group and laugh together  
or solo to sharpen your deduction skills  

It’s simple but surprisingly deep, testing your observation, imagination,  
and intuition — fun for both kids and adults


The game supports both button controls and touch controls, allowing you to play in TV mode, handheld mode, or tabletop mode.
※This game is designed to be played on the Nintendo Switch™ in vertical orientation.
